original_title: Deep Roots Music Vol. 2: Bunny Lee Story / Black Ark
overview: "The Bunny Lee Story" reveals the career of a creative producer whose associates include Jackie Edwards, Johnny Clarke, and Prince Jazzbo. Prince Jammy, Wayne Smith, and Junior Reed also appear. Rastafari's influence on reggae is explored in "Black Ark," with footage of Nyabinghi, The Mighty Diamonds, and Bob Marley providing highlights.
title: Deep Roots Music Vol. 2: Bunny Lee Story / Black Ark
